mapper.insert: insert into product (id, name, price, product_desc, img, img_path, product_amount) values (seq_cart.nextval, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productDesc}, #{img}, #{imgPath}, #{productAmount})
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, price, product_desc, img, img_path, product_amount from product where id = #{productId}

select * from (select a.*, rownum AS rnum from (select id as product_id, name as product_name, price as product_price, product_desc as product_desc, img as img, img_path as img_path, product_amount as product_amount from product where 1=1
order by name) a) WHERE rnum between #{paging.firstRow} and #{paging.lastRow}

SELECT s.take_name, s.take_hp, s.take_mail, s.take_add, s.take_detail_add, s.take_auto_add, s.take_req FROM save_cart s WHERE s.USER_ID = #{id} AND s.save_num = (select max(save_num) from save_cart where user_id = #{id})
SELECT c.amount, p.name as product_name, p.price * c.amount as price FROM cart c, product p WHERE c.USER_ID = #{id} AND c.product_id = p.id
